title: WTB: Old Judge N172 Union Association alumni
author: Justin88

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judge N172 Union Association alumni
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

been a while since I collected baseball cards, but I just had my first book published titled [URL="https://mcfarlandbooks.com/product/baseballs-union-association/"]Baseball's Union Association[/URL], and thought it would be neat to get an Old Judge of a player who appeared in the league. 

By my count 60 UA alumni appear in the N172 set.

Fred Dunlap would be my number one choice, but am interested in any alumni.

Also would be interested in the Dunlap N162 as well.

Feel free to message me.

thanks Justin
What might make it easier is if you post the players that are in the OJ set that played in the UA.  People could check to see what they have and someone might be able to help you find your card.
